Description: Hello, Here is a 2013 Gibson Les Paul Signature T which was slightly modified to look more like a Standard . A Beautiful Vintage Sunburst on a AA flamed Maple top. A one piece solid mahogany back with Gibsons Traditional weight relief. The Guitar has a nice weight 8.5 pounds on bathroom scale. Players grade condition with some marks, scuffs, dings, and marrs here, and there. There are some dings, and imprints on the back of neck, and neck heel. (see pics. # 11, and 12) , they do not hinder playing ,you can feel them, but they do look worse with camera flash. Some pics. taken with Flash, and some without. No structural issues, No breaks, no repairs. The 57, and 57 + open coil Gibson humbuckers provide all the PAF tone you could ever ask for. The Guitars 2 Volume pots, have the push pull /pots to split the Humbuckers providing you with a myriad of tones. An easy playing 60s profile neck with a 12 inch fingerboard radius. The frets have hardly any fret wear. They were polished, and the board has been treated with linseed oil. Very smooth, fast, and beautifully grained board. Kluson Deluxe Tuners added for more traditional Standard look. The Bridge was changed out for the Gibson ABR 1 Standard bridge from a 2017 Les Paul Standard. A big improvement in tone, and bending. Original Gibson Nashville bridge also in case compartment. The Cream pick guard is included too in case compartment. The Standard truss rod cover was also added. Original Hard shell black tolex Gibson LOGO white lined case in excellent condition is included with the sale. I will cover Full insurance when shipping this Les Paul to you via Fed Ex. Thank you.
Title: Gibson Les Paul Signature T 2013 Tobacco Burst AA Flame,Upgrades,Tone,Feel, OHSC
